name: everythingisawesome
description: A website displaying optimistic, feel-good news stories

scripts.dev:ios: concurrently "npm run server" "cd mobile && npm run ios"
scripts.dev:android: concurrently "npm run server" "cd mobile && npm run android"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run mobile"
scripts.dev:with-warnings: concurrently "npm run server" "cd client && npm run start:with-warnings"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install:shared && cd client && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.install:client: npm run install:shared && cd client && npm install
scripts.install:mobile: npm run install:shared && cd mobile && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && echo '\nâœ… Setup complete! Don\'t forget to:' && echo '1. Add your GROK_API_KEY to the .env file' && echo '2. Add your NEWS_API_KEY to the .env file' && echo '3. Run "npm run generate-themed-fallbacks" to create the themed fallback images' && echo '4. Run "npm run dev" for web + server' && echo '5. Run "npm run dev:mobile" for mobile + server' && echo '6. Run "npm run dev:all" for web + mobile + server' && echo '7. Visit http://localhost:3000 for web or use Expo app for mobile'
